description: This is a meta-bug used for tracking progress of the 2013.1.5 Grizzly stable update to cinder, glance, horizon, keystone, nova, and neutron  in Ubuntu 12.04 cloud archive.
title: Meta bug for tracking Openstack 2013.1.5 Stable Update

comments.content: This is a meta-bug used for tracking progress of the 2013.1.5 Grizzly stable update to cinder, glance, horizon, keystone, nova,  in Ubuntu 13.04.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zulcss

comments.content:
packages accepted into -proposed and smoke tested in the QA lab OK.

+7 for final push to -updates.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~james-page

comments.content:
All updates released into the -updates pocket.

Note that this is the last upstream stable release of grizzly.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~james-page
